title: Delicious chocolate chip banana bread
ingredients: ['75g butter, at room temperature', '80ml Manuka honey', '225g mashed bananas', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon fleur de sel (sea salt flakes)', '4 tablespoons hot water', '50g dark chocolate chips', '2 tablespoons chopped walnuts']
